original: 檄文發佈後，各路諸侯群起響應，袁紹被推為反董卓聯盟之盟主，眼見董卓軍勢兵強馬壯，各方諸侯卻各懷異心，不敢妄動…
text: After the message was released, the princes from all walks of life responded. Yuan Shao was promoted as the leader of the anti-Dong Zhuo alliance. Seeing that Dong Zhuo's army is strong and powerful, the princes of all parties have different hearts and dare not move...
